snippet.title: Death's Gambit Gameplay Trailer 2018 | Adult Swim Games
snippet.description:
Death's Gambit is a challenging 2D action platformer with deep RPG elements. As an agent of Death bound to his service, unravel the mystery of Siradon and discover the true price of immortality.
 
Embrace your destiny on August 14, 2018 on Steam and PlayStation 4.
 
Pre-order now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/356650/Deaths_Gambit/
 
PlayStation 4: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/deaths-gambit-ps4/
